drinks.name: Dark Roast
drinks.caption: Dark and smoky flavor with rich and powerful taste

drinks.name: Blonde Roast
drinks.caption: Light colored beans with a milder and less bitter flavor

drinks.name: Medium Roast
drinks.caption: Rich dark color and slightly bittersweet taste

drinks.name: Decaf Coffee
drinks.caption: Medium roast flavor without the caffeine of regular coffee

drinks.name: Iced Coffee
drinks.caption: Medium roast coffee lightly sweetened and poured over ice

drinks.name: Americano
drinks.caption: Espresso shots combined with hot water to resemble coffee brewed in drip filter

drinks.name: Iced Tea
drinks.caption: Black tea leaves lightly sweetened and poured over ice

drinks.name: Lemonade
drinks.caption: Fresh lemon juice with a hint of sugar and poured over ice
